items.sentence: Tom was given detention for talking during class.
Tom was glad that Mary was able to pass the test.
Tom was just about to go out when the phone rang.
I had a girlfriend when I was in the fifth grade.
Now that you\'re here, perhaps you could help me.
Tom doesn\'t have to sing if he doesn\'t want to.
Tom doesn\'t often have a chance to speak French.
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to go to Boston with John.
Tom grabbed a piece of wood and hit Mary with it.
Tom had better have a good excuse for being late.
